title: Golden Light (Steam) Giveaway
description: Score Golden Light for free via Steam! Golden Light is a survival FPS with roguelike features. Check it out!
instructions:
1. Click the button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Download directly via Steam store before the offer expires.
3. That´s it! Enjoy!

title: 3on3 FreeStyle: Beginner's Starter Kit (Steam) Giveaway

title: Nested Lands Alpha Steam Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free Nested Lands Closed Alpha Steam Key and join the closed alpha from February 13 to February 26! Gather survivors, build a settlement, craft, master your skills, and survive in this RPG game.
instructions:
1. Login into your free Alienware account and click the button to unlock your key.
2. Launch the Steam client and click the Games menu option.
3. Choose "activate a Product on Steam" to redeem your Steam key.

title: What The Fog Steam Key Giveaway
description: Claim your free What The Fog Steam Key via Behaviour (the official developer website)! What The Fog is a 2-person co-op roguelite game filled with magic powers, non-stop action and lots of monsters! Check it out!
instructions:
1. Click the "Get Giveaway" button to visit the giveaway page.
2. Register or Login into your free Behaviour account.
3. Link your Steam account.
4. Click the button to copy your FREE Steam key
5. Launch the Steam client and click the Games menu option.
6. Choose "activate a Product on Steam" to redeem your Steam key.

title: Destiny 2: Be True Emblem Code
description:
Claim your Destiny 2: Be True Emblem Code for free! Find the code below and follow the instructions to redeem your Emblem code.

CODE: ML3-FD4-ND9
instructions:
1. Navigate to the Destiny 2 code redemption page (click on the "Get Loot" button).
2. Choose your platform, sign in to your platform account, then just add your code and redeem it.
platforms: PC, Steam, Playstation 5, Xbox Series X|S, Playstation 4, Xbox One
